targets.expr: sum(rate(node_cpu{instance=~"($host)(:[0-9]+)?"}[$interval])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance=~"($host)(:[0-9]+)?"}) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance=~"($host)(:[0-9]+)?"}[10m])) by (mode) * 100 / count_scalar(node_cpu{mode="user", instance=~"($host)(:[0-9]+)?"})

seriesOverrides.alias: Processes blocked waiting for I/O to complete

targets.legendFormat: Processes blocked waiting for I/O to complete
